Boise_City.Idaho Centennial Ladies' Open:
The Idaho Centennial Ladies' Open was a women's professional golf tournament on the LPGA Tour, played only in 1963 in Boise, Idaho. The 54-hole event was held 55 years ago at Hillcrest Country Club over the Labor Day weekend, Saturday through Monday.
Mickey Wright won the event by four strokes over runner-up Kathy Whitworth; both players shot 68 (–3) in the final round.
